page.title: 15YOUTH AT PLAY
page.content:
As well as the park facilities, {Brownies and Guides}groups for girls meet and for boys{Cubs and Scouts, with their own name "The Delvers" originating from clay potteries.
There is a{Toddlers' group}with fun for young children and a welcome change for mothers.
A{Youth Club}provides table tennis, netball, football, dancing and other activities for those aged between 14 and 21.
{Christopher says }My {favourite game} is {'Tig off the ground'}. First you pick somebody whom you want to be on and whoever is on gives you the off and you run and get off the ground so they can't tig you. Whoever is caught is the next one on.
